NK100(the)001:1: // rdzogs pa chen po thugs kyi snying po stobs gsum gyi man ngag bzhugs so //
NK100(the)001:3: san ti ma h+aa tsi ta garba pa la t+r+ai u pa d+he sha /bod skad du /
NK100(the)001:4: rdzogs pa chen po thugs kyi snying po stobs gsum gyi gdams ngag ces bya ba /
NK100(the)001:5: sku gsum ston pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK100(the)001:6: rdzogs chen gdams ngag stobs gsum gyis //
NK100(the)001:7: gdul bya rnam gsum drang pa'i phyir //
NK100(the)001:8: ston pa gsum gyis gsungs pa bzhin //
NK100(the)001:9: phyi rabs drang phyir bshad par bya //
NK100(the)001:10: de la rdzogs pa chen po snyan brgyud thugs kyi snying po'i gdams ngag gi stobs gsum gyis /
NK100(the)001:11: gdul bya drang pa la gsum /
NK100(the)001:12: gzhung bshad pa'i dbang du byas te /
NK100(the)001:13: shes de dag gi ngos bzung ba dang gcig /zin pa rtags kyi nyams bstan pa dang /
NK100(the)001:14: ye shes ngos zin pa'i mthun pa'i dpe bstan pa dang gsum mo //
NK100(the)001:15: thun mong ma yin pa'i gnad kyi ye shes ngos bzung ba la gsum ste /
NK100(the)001:16: ye shes gang gis ngos bzung ba dang gcig /zin pa rtags kyi nyams bstan pa dang gnyis /
NK100(the)001:17: zin pa mthun pa'i dpe bstan pa dang gsum mo //
NK100(the)001:18: gsang pa thil du phebs pa'i ye shes ngos bzung pa la gsum ste /
NK100(the)001:19: gsang pa thil du phebs pa'i ye shes gang gis ngos bzung ba dang /
NK100(the)001:20: ye shes de zin pa rtags kyi nyams bstan pa dang /
NK100(the)001:21: zin pa mthun pa'i dpe bstan pa'o //
NK100(the)001:22: zab mo nar son pa'i ye shes ngos bzung pa la gsum ste /
NK100(the)001:23: zab mo'i ye shes de gang gis ngos bzung ba dang /
NK100(the)001:24: ye shes de zin pa rtags kyi nyams bstan pa dang /
NK100(the)001:25: ye shes de zin pa'i mthun pa'i dpes bstan pa'o //
NK100(the)001:26: ting nge 'dzin gyi bar do la goms pa'i mthu bskyed pa ni /
NK100(the)001:27: ma gsal ba gsal bar bya ste /
NK100(the)001:28: bsgom pa ni ma dran pa la ma brjed pa zhig dgos te /
NK100(the)001:29: zhi gnas kyi stobs kyis mi g.yo ba /
NK100(the)001:30: lhag mthong gi stobs kyis gsal ba /
NK100(the)001:31: cha mnyam pa'i stobs kyis phyogs kyi mthar ma lhung pa /
NK100(the)001:32: dran pa'i stobs kyis gzungs su zin pa dang bzhis bsgom pa ral du zhugs pa'o //
NK100(the)001:33: rmi lam rtags kyi bar do la bag chags kyi tshad bzung ste /
NK100(the)001:35: dug lnga rgyas pa'i bag chags dang /
NK100(the)001:36: 'dus byas chos kyi bag chags dang /
NK100(the)001:37: ye shes chen po'i bag chags so //
NK100(the)001:38: srid pa'i bar do la las kyi 'phro mthud pa la bzhi ste /
NK100(the)001:39: bar do rang gi ngo bo ngos bzung pa dang /
NK100(the)001:40: srid pa'i bar ma do'i dbang po bstan pa dang /
NK100(the)001:41: sngon gyi bag chags rjes su dran par bya ba dang /
NK100(the)001:42: dran pa gzungs su zin pa'i nan tan dang bzhi'o //
NK100(the)001:43: gdams nga ga dmar byang dag tu bstan pa /
NK100(the)001:44: bar do bzhi pa'i gdams pa bstan pa /
NK100(the)001:45: kun la spel ba min no //
NK100(the)001:46: thugs la chongs zhig /rdzogs so ////srid pa'i bar do la /
NK100(the)001:48: 'dir kha gang drag pa phyi mar dbang che bas /
NK100(the)001:49: dbang por rang gis sems tshud par bya'o //
NK100(the)001:50: byed pa rgyu mthun myong ba rgyu mthun dang /
NK100(the)001:52: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu'o ////bla ma'i phyag dpe la /
